bike.description: Butted, singlespeed-specific, 26" Reynolds 520 Cr-Mo frame with integrated headset, MID BB shell, 3D forged horizontal dropouts w/ disc mount, integrated chain tensioner

components.description: Hi-Ten tapered and butted Cr-Mo blades, 1-1/8" threadless, 5mm dropouts for 3/8" axle
Integrated 1-1/8" threadless, Campy-style, full cartridge bearings
P. Series drop type, forged alloy, front load w/ CNC side holes, black hardware, 22.2mm
Butted Cr-Mo riser bar, 75mm rise, 8º backsweep, 2º upsweep, 22.2mm
P. Grip, flanged soft compound, open end w/ endplug, 150mm
Avid BB5, mechanical disc brake, intl std mount, 140mm G2 Clean Sweep rotor
Avid FR-5, alloy "V" brake, two-finger, linear pull
Singlespeed, Cr-Mo, 12t
KMC Z510XRB, 1/2" x 1/8", heavy duty, anti-drop inner links
3pc. tubular, heat-treated Cr-Mo for 8 spline, 175mm length
CNC cut 6061, 25T, Motostar design
MID BB, 2x sealed cartridge bearing w/ 19mm, 8-spline, hollow Cr-Mo spindle, alloy tube, and cone spacers
P. Lo Pro nylon platform w/ molded pins, loose ball, 9/16"
P. 26, alloy double-wall, 36mm, pinned, 36h
Low flange, 2x sealed cartridge bearing, 3/8" Cr-Mo axle, nutted type, 36h
Singlespeed cassette, loose ball, polished races, machined disc mount and flanges, 10mm Cr-Mo axle, 19mm contact, nutted type w/ track nuts, 36h
Stainless, 2.0mm (14g)
Specialized Rhythm Lite Control, 60 TPI, aramid bead, 26x2.3"
Specialized Compound Control, 60 TPI, aramid bead, 26x2.2"
Schrader valve
P. Combo, 1pc co-molded composite saddle and alloy 25.4mm seat post combination w/ embossed "P. Series" logo padded cover
Alloy, 25.4mm, no offset
Integrated Cr-Mo bolt and nylock nut
Reflectors, owners manual
